Title: Store Front
Description: Welcome to store front this is going to built for the community by the community im sick of not having a word press style system in asp.net form for developers
HomeWiki:
Store front asp.net csharp open source e-commerce platform built for mobiles first

Welcome to store front this is going to built for the community by the community im sick of not having a word press style system in asp.net form for developers to build upon

It will be built using asp.net web forms. Why not razor I feel wile razor is good it does have its limitations if the community feels strong enough I will make a razor version but for now lets build on what we no.

I will be using EF 4.5 throughout this project as their is no need for other third party or mappers when the tools already exist in .net.

One feature I am really wanting to implement and i am hopping that the community will help me is a drag and drop form builder
